price: maliban sa niloob ni Allāh. Tunay na Siya ay nakaaalam sa lantad at anumang nagkukubli.
arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā mā shāa al-lahu innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra wamā yakhfā
